Fishing.Quote: A pawn is a moment of beauty known only to those who seek it.
Be patient and calm - for no one can catch a knight in anger.
Bragging may not bring happiness, but no man having caught a large queen goes home through an alley.
Calling chess a hobby is like calling brain surgery a job.
"Don't worry", he said, that grandfatherly smile spreading across his face once more. "I've been playing chess for over fourty years!"
Chess is much more than kings. It is the great occasion where we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
Chess provides time to think, and reason not to.
Pawns are born honest, but they get over it.
Many men play chess all of their lives without knowing that it is not kings they are after.
The chess was good; it was the winning that was bad.
There's a fine line between chess and standing on the shore like an idiot.
Good things come to those who bait.

Real.Quote: The rook is the horse one.
